title: After Dark
description: Taggart McKenna is an elite bodyguard. Skilled, serious, and a little bit mysterious, he's the kind of man who uses words like "surveillance" and "tactical evasion" at barbecues. When the woman he's secretly admired is embroiled in danger, he steps up in an unexpected way.London a stunning model, bilingual bookworm, and plant enthusiast, is rebounding from a mother-arranged, disastrous love affair. What she craves is a laughter-filled romance, or perhaps, just the laughter, not a murder investigation with her name in the center.Taggart steps in, offering an unusual a fake-relationship alibi. With London's mother scrutinizing their every move and their pretend romance starting to feel alarmingly real, the stakes rise dramatically. Can they pull off their charade, find the truth and keep their burgeoning feelings in check? All under the watchful eye of a meddling mother?Find out in this fast-paced, heartwarming romantic comedy from bestselling author Susan Amanda Kelly.
author: Susan Amanda Kelly
